column5: We did this last year, but I'm sure many have forgotten or were not here for this last year. Please post your cold weather/fall Quinte tips! Here's mine: As most will be wearing Floatation Suits, here's a tip. If your returning to the cabin for lunch, take your suit off and turn it inside out.  Same for over night. You will be amazed at how much moisture builds up inside your suit, while you wear it. Can make for a very uncomfortable day on the water. Ok... your turn! HH

- drain plug (good all-season advice) - gas line antifreeze / RV antifreeze for livewells & bildge - rain-ex on your windshield so you don't have to scrape in the morning (esp. handy on curved plastic windshields) - be gentle with your clear side curtains in the cold - don't spin on the ramp (brakes/put in gear/light throttle/ease off brakes) - don't wear cotton as a base layer - don't puke in your buddies new boat
Bring sand, launch ramps can get pretty icy at this time of the year.
Terry,bring yer waterproof suit. I still get a good chuckle from that day. Good thing the sun was out eh? LOL
Don't put Joe in your boat... he's a jinx I tell ya...

LMAO. You mean to tell me,there will guys looking for the key, to get to the latch thats hiding the ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,oh wait,yer guys,,,,,,,,,,right??????????????      Rob,you watch out for them Yanks.

don't puke in your buddies new boat  Oh your his replacement.Brian  Some tips bring hand warmers I bought a 10 pack from CTC for $9.99.  If you are running a tiller bring some goggles or your tears will freeze. If its raining it won't hurt your eyes.Poor man's side console  Bring a bag of salt or sand to the launch if you don't have a 4 X 4 keep some metal traction aids in your vehicle.  Well have a safe drive to the BOQ folks I am leaving at 0400 looking forward to meeting some new OFC members.  MTP
Have your wife help do your packing.This way you wont forget anything.You will actually have more than you need.
Just remember she put your silk pajamas in your tackle box Dan !!
Darn and I was looking for those.Well if reef runnes dont work maybe I will tie on my silkies.
Remember to pack your boots right  Bassmastermike???
Don't try to net someone elses Wall-ice unless you've actually used a net before!!!
Hurry up and go senial will ya.At least she won't be there so I will be off that hook this week
I will explain tomorrow.Its about a nice fish Bly caught.  You should be in bed.I know me too I am all packed and ready to go.  Now I can't sleep
Take lots of alcohol and the Parcheesi board:  http://www.weather.com/outlook/travel/busi...ayLink_business
A man's got to be good at something Wayne!!!! HH
